pullRequest.title: Handle mixed case partition names in sync_partition_metadata

nodes.bodyText: it should rather be procedure (optional) parameter. Sorry for miscommunication on this.
Make this case_sensitive since “insensitive” is a negative and using negatives for booleans can be confusing. This is my fault since I suggested a bad name when filing the issue.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -94,18 +97,19 @@ public Procedure get()
                 ImmutableList.of(
                         new Argument("schema_name", VARCHAR),
                         new Argument("table_name", VARCHAR),
-                        new Argument("mode", VARCHAR)),
+                        new Argument("mode", VARCHAR),
+                        new Argument("case_insensitive", BOOLEAN, false, FALSE)),

nodes.bodyText: add a case with COL_X=UPPER_CASE that woud verify the value is registered as UPPER_CASE and not upper_case

commit.message: Handle mixed case partition names in sync_partition_metadata

afterCommit.message: Handle mixed case partition names in sync_partition_metadata
